fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Allow a player to pet you at night. (3 uses.)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When a player that seems innocent pets you, they receive Overkill Defence for the night.
- When a player that seems guilty to you pets you, you will attack them.
- When you attack somebody, they can attack you back if they are kill capable.
